description: This file defines a custom React hook named usePagination that manages pagination state for a frontend component. It handles current page, page size, total items, and provides navigation methods.

methods.name: usePagination({ initialPage = 1, pageSize = 10, total = null, onPageChange = null } = {})
methods.description: A React hook that manages pagination state, allowing components to track current page, page size, and handle navigation such as next, previous, and direct page setting.

ctags.name: usePagination
ctags.pattern: /^export function usePagination({ initialPage = 1, pageSize = 10, total = null, onPageChange = nul/
ctags.signature: ({ initialPage = 1, pageSize = 10, total = null, onPageChange = null } = {})
